name: Chataclysm
description:
Chataclysm by David Paul

Legend has it that there is a treasure trove of great loot and riches. The fortune is said to lie at the very top of a perilous climb. However, all those that have tried have been pulled down by an evil monster. The monster known as........ chat

Welcome to the game where chat directly affects the player. And can only be WON with a chat alliance. Every chat message will try to stop your journey to the top

  • Do the viewers spam Kappa enough to reset the entire run?
  • Do the viewers flood messages to constantly flip your direction?
  • Do viewers resub at key moments that ruin your concentration?
  • Do viewers decide to stop you mid-air?
  • Do you dare try to climb and fight against the chat?

Then carry on noble player! Set forth and let the challenge commence... 

AND BEGIN THE CHATACLYSM!!!

Credits:
Game & Programming: David Paul
Music: EX-LYD 
Art: kenny.nl, miketenebrae, msmetafan, opengameassets

Note to streamers and mods: The game uses a Read-Only Twitch token to read chat.  No permissions or setup are required to run the game.
Changing browser tabs may cause animation / music to get out of sync

The game is free, but donations are accepted. All donations are used for paying for game assets and art.
